import { useNavigate, useParams } from "react-router-dom"; import { useState } from "react"; import useFetch from "../hooks/useFetch"; import contactImgUrl from "/Users/haidar/Desktop/crud-app/client/src/images/user.png" export default function ContactDetails() { let { contactId } = useParams(); const navigate = useNavigate(); const url = `http://localhost:3001/getUsers${contactId}`; const [data, error] = useFetch(url) const [updateContactData, setUpdateContactData] = useState(data); console.log("updateContactData ", updateContactData); const [editing, setEditing] = useState(true); function handleUpdateValue(e) { console.log("function") } useFetch(() => { setUpdateContactData(data); console.log(updateContactData) }, [data]) return ( <>
{error !== null ? (
